name: Titus the Fox
description: Platform game of exceptional size: More than 900 screens on 15 levels with 54 extraordinary enemies.Secret rooms, hidden bonuses, and deadly traps.Unique system of interaction: player - enemies - objects - backgrounds.Options: level codes, continue, adjustable 8-way scrolling.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10) Processor: 1.8 GHz Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 10 MB available space Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard
recommended_requirements: Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0
